about_the_game:
Play as a Cactus Hunter. Your job? Hunt down killer cacti!

Explore the of killer cacti infested open-world with your truck.

Explore the open-world to loot some lost treasures. Your truck is with you,
which loads your valuables. But take care, the killer cacti are out there.

Get hired as a Cactus Hunter.

It's your job to hunt down the killer cacti which terrorize the villagers. They're gonna reward you with some nice car upgrades and gold.

Spend your earnings on new weapons and traps.

Spend your earnings on new weapons or traps at local dealers and become a better Cactus Hunter.

Gather a team to execute the cactus wipe out plan.

Gather a team of the best warriors out there and execute a plan to become the most legendary Cactus Hunter the world has ever known.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580 (or greater)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get hired as a Cactus Hunter, explore the killer cacti infested open-world with your truck, help villagers in return for valuables and wipe out the so-called Terror Spikys in this Comedy Survival-Horror Game.
